maxConnectFour
Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
  maxConnectFour.GameBoard

public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object

This is the Gameboard class. It implements a two dimension array that represents a connect four gameboard. It keeps track of the player making the next play based on the number of pieces on the game board. It provides all of the methods needed to implement the playing of a max connect four game.

Method Detail

getScore

public int getScore(int player)
this method returns the score for the player given as an argument. it checks horizontally, vertically, and each direction diagonally. currently, it uses for loops, but i'm sure that it can be made more efficient.

Parameters:
player - the player whose score is being requested. valid values are 1 or 2
Returns:
the integer of the players score

getCurrentTurn

public int getCurrentTurn()
the method gets the current turn

Returns:
an int value representing whose turn it is. either a 1 or a 2

public int getPieceCount()
this method returns the number of pieces that have been played on the board

Returns:
an int representing the number of pieces that have been played on board alread

getGameBoard

public int[][] getGameBoard()
this method returns the whole gameboard as a dual indexed array

Returns:
a dual indexed array representing the gameboard

isValidPlay

public boolean isValidPlay(int column)
a method that determines if a play is valid or not. It checks to see if the column is within bounds. If the column is within bounds, and the column is not full, then the play is valid.

Parameters:
column - an int representing the column to be played in.
Returns:
true if the play is valid
false if it is either out of bounds or the column is full

playPiece

public boolean playPiece(int column)
This method plays a piece on the game board.

Parameters:
column - the column where the piece is to be played.
Returns:
true if the piece was successfully played
false otherwise

removePiece

public void removePiece(int column)
this method removes the top piece from the game board

Parameters:
column - the column to remove a piece from
